pullrequest.title: scale logo to fit in sidebar in generated docs

content.raw: I played with that to figure out a good size before scaling the .png.  But assuming that we don't use this image elsewhere, it might as well be at the right size; otherwise we're sending a bigger-than-necessary image to everybody and having their browsers scale it down for presentation.
content.html: I played with that to figure out a good size before scaling the .png. But assuming that we don't use this image elsewhere, it might as well be at the right size; otherwise we're sending a bigger-than-necessary image to everybody and having their browsers scale it down for presentation.
